content: As I mentioned earlier, we're seeing direct ARR growth from new customers and upsells, and just as importantly, our Q3 gross retention rate was the highest it has been this year. I think as our -- I will say this, as our platform has broadened and as the range of solutions that we're offering across the platform has grown, it's not as simple as our position as the clear leader in listings, which is important to us and which we're going to continue to defend through innovation.
